Title: Requires electronic monitoring for certain sex offenders
Summary: Requires electronic monitoring for certain sex offenders; requires the division of criminal justice services to establish a system of active electronic monitoring that identifies the location of certain sex offenders; makes it a crime for a sex offender required to be electronically monitored to violate such requirement.
LawCode: Rel ยง168-w to be ยง168-x, add ยง168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring the electronic monitoring of certain sex offenders
